basics.summary:
Developer and NodeSchool Campinas organizer.

Before you continue, I strongly recommend you to read my github profile. This LinkedIn was created as just first contact.

I love to participate in Software Communities, JavaScript, Clean Code, Linux, Open Source, Docker, Functional Programming...

You also may visit me on github and Code Wars.

work.summary:
Trabalhei e ajudei a construir a base da arquitetura e estrutural do produto. Mantive tanto o funcionamento do código, quanto da infraestrutura.

No processo me aprofundei ainda mais sobre tecnologias como: NestJS NextJS, Kubernetes, Terraform, GraphQL, RabbitMQ, e produtos da AWS.
Na Gupy consegui aplicar muito do que aprendi nas empresas anteriores. Principalmente testes de integração e de unidade, além de ter desenvolvido ainda mais meu conhecimento em OO.

Me aprofundei muito em qualidade de software dentro da Lambda3, um local onde consegui aplicar de forma concreta coisas como: Testes de Unidade, Integração, E2E, Carga, Mutação, dentre outros; Também me aprofundei em estururas de FP e OO; além de consegui aprender um pouco sobre eng reversa de binários.

Outra coisa muito importante pra mim foi poder ver em prática uma empresa verdadeiramente horizontal e com uma das melhores culturas internas que conheci.

Helped founding a startup, there we developed and thought about all architectural specs from scratch. Using microservices with kubernetes, we manage to deliver an stable version.

The architecture was built thinking about speed and scalability while maintaining best practices like automated testing, clean code techniques, clean architecture, and so on.

We managed to work in partnership with Movile group to build Fundação 1 Bi, who bought and keep part of our product working.


There we got experience scaling the product while maintaining a small product cost, this resulted in aprox. 6 months of extra life without investment while not impacting user experience at all./nAlso learned some good and hard lessons about entrepreneurship, so, now I can understand and became more emphatic about problems outside technical teams and how to communicate to outside it.
Working with NodeJS and React (with redux), I built high scalable products in an microservices architecture.
highlights: Authentication - a new SSO authentication system using KeyCloak and libraries to connect to it
Integration - we rewrite the service separating it in an API and workers, using message queue architecture (RabbitMQ)
Networks - an API rebuild of one of their products, implementing 100% coverage of unit tests and optimizing pain points
Search - an service with focus on search all thing in our system. I worked mostly at the front using React and Redux

work.summary: At PrinciWeb I build Web Systems, Apps and Websites with tons of different tecnologies. (mostly, with NodeJS and C#)
highlights: Robo Tope - Our partly open source robot to automate jobs at the company
NFe - An NFe generator. Build with PHP and MySQL.
Imuneasy - A web system for Immunization Clinics management. Build with NodeJS, CoffeeScript, Express, MsSql.
Stylist - Android app to share photos of fashion looks with friends. Builded with C#, WebApi, Entity Framework, Ionic.
